boost::xint::detail::data_t::QuickDigits

boost::xint::detail::data_t::QuickDigits Struct Reference

List of all members.

Static Public Attributes

static const size_t intbits = std::numeric_limits<unsigned int>::digits
static const size_t suggested = (2*intbits/bits_per_digit)
 We want at least enough QuickDigits to hold two standard int types.
static const size_t minimum = 3
 The library's code is written to depend on this value, don't change it.
static const size_t count = (suggested < minimum ? minimum : suggested)

Detailed Description

Holds information determining how many quick-digits to use.

Smaller numbers are represented in a small array of digits that are part of the data_t structure itself, so that no additional memory allocation is needed for them. The contents of this structure determine how many of them the library uses.
